intro: Telis macrorrhyncha, commonly known as the large-lobed telis, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its striking, showy inflorescences. The plant features lance-shaped leaves with prominent veins and produces clusters of tubular flowers in shades of red and purple.
